fields.summary: wireframe multi-action buttons for landing pages

issuetype.description: A user story. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: With full width MSB, we need to consolidate action buttons to avoid wrapping header info.
fields.summary: implement multi-action buttons on landing pages

comments.body:
[~jloza],
after a survey of the screens, there are very few that require special treatment.
Keypairs and bucket-contents are the only ones with 2 "create" buttons.
Keypairs has no secondary buttons, so both will fit without change
Bucket-contents is the only screen with multiple secondary buttons.

Perhaps bucket-contents could be handled specially and leave the rest alone?
also main bucket landing,  folder content. I'd rather do all the multi-buttons at once, including the multi-creates, please, for consistency of affordance.

the bucket landing page only has a single button.
The folder content page === bucket-contents.

but, I hear you about the consistency.
Bucket landing will have secondary buttons once GUI-1587 (currently unassigned but int he sprint) is implemented....consistency is good!

for widget functionality, I assume we're going for something like http://foundation.zurb.com/docs/components/topbar.html
look for "Right button dropdown" on the second sample menu bar. Functionally, mouse-over expands to show options. I have this working on keypairs page, but needs moar styling.
[~dkavanagh], more like this: http://foundation.zurb.com/docs/components/split_buttons.html
I saw that too.. ok. will do.

- need to fix split drop behavior so it dismisses after selection, and if clicking elsewhere on screen
- add "Paste" title to paste button

Looking good, [~dkavanagh]! A few minor things then you are GTG:

* Bucket landing page is split and has a TBD hanging off it but the wireframe shows that button should not be split. 
* Bucket content page: Item should read "Create Folder" not "Create New Folder"
updated!
UX review passed, ready for code review. Thanks, [~dkavanagh]!
GUI-1407 merged

[~jloza] I am not seeing split buttons on bucket landing page. Per https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Landing+page+header+info it seems that Open shared Bucket, Download Object and Upload Objects should be there.
[~alice], those are being added in GUI-1587 and are not part of this, per Jenny's may 12th comment.
[~dkavanagh] I am confused, if there is still work to be done,  why is this ticket "In QA"
[~jloza] I wonder why is this ticket "In QA" since after GUI-1587 is done there will be more actions added to bucket landing page, which will require UX review.

[~alice] since the bucket landing page split buttons are associated with new functions that are being added to the console, they wil be UX reviewed (and QA'ed) along with the associated functions in GUI-1587, instead of here, which only takes existing stuff in the console and puts the access to it under split buttons. Hope that plan makes sense to you as well.
[~jloza] It makes sense, but it would be good to have in the bug the list of specific places where I am supposed to check, or at least note the exceptions in the bug.  I will approve this fix then.
Yep, agreed [~alice]. We definitely could have been more specific about the exception.
Released in 4.2
